name: Space V
description:
Controls: hold left click or hold Z to move the spaceship (white triangle) to your cursor. Space to activate the pulse.

Arcade game synced with music. You, player, will have o collect as many minerals as you can (green hexagons), they appear up to the beat. But during the track, some asteroids appear and goes towards the payer (straight line), if it touches you, you die and have to start again. These asteroids are yellow, blue and pink squeares (each onen with different velocities) and are also synced with music, mostly with percussion.

If you feel surrounded, activate the pulse and destroy all asteroids in screen. It costs 50 minerals and has a 15 sec cooldown.

This is in development, any feedback is welcome.
